name: Asteroids (itch) (MrEliptik)
description:
Simple game made live with Godot 4.0 on YouTube to show beginners how to create a simple game and make it juicier. 

IMPORTANT: Web build is broken because of Godot 4.0. If you want to test the game, use the windows or linux version. 

Sources: https://github.com/MrEliptik/asteroids
